data.message:
I've just signed up! 😊

The Oxford dicrionary? Wow... For real that is in there??. That's amazing!

I love Stan,
Sometimes they honestly do go crazy... It's really sad.Especially when a celebrity or someone genuinely hasn't done anything to create the chaos in their minds..
I've always said, The way you express, the way you tell a tale with your music .. 

By the way your merchandise is killer!.. Like the rest of your stuff. An entrepreneur! A true business man.

So much respect for you. 👍👌
